title: Archaeologists discover stunning ancient battle trumpet in region tied to legendary queen
description: The near-complete Iron Age carnyx was used to blare eerie sounds in battle and rally troops against the enemy.

title: Powering Africa’s industries: Should the region leapfrog the use of fossil fuels? | Brookings
description: Ahmadou Aly Mbaye and Mbayang Thiam weigh different methods of meeting Africa's energy needs without overly increasing gas emissions.

title: Martian ‘Black Beauty’ rock that crashed down to Earth contains ancient WATER secret from Red Planet, scans reveal
description: A MYSTERIOUS rock that fell to Earth from Mars may hold some watery secrets about the Red Planet – and possibly alien life. The so-called “Black Beauty” meteorite was discovered back in 2011 by unsuspecting nomads exploring the Sahara Desert. It’s not known when the 320g rock arrived on Earth but the oldest fragment is... [...]

title: Scientist accidentally stumbles across bizarre ancient ‘wrinkle structures’ in Morocco that shouldn't be there
description: Ancient fossil structures imprinted on rocks that were once deep beneath the ocean suggest the search for the first life on Earth needs to be broadened.

title: Scientist accidentally stumbles across bizarre ancient ‘wrinkle structures’ in Morocco that shouldn't be there - Live Science
